I'm getting my ears back! ºoº
I'm happy to announce that I am re-joining Disney on Monday 10/30. I will lead Acquisition Marketing for Disney Shopping (aka Disney Store). Super excited!
LinkedIn has been a great adventure for the last couple of years and I am thankful for that run. Met so many great people, worked on very cool projects and learned a ton.
It will be nice now that my commute doesn't require an airplane.

August 26, 2014, Jim worked with Raj in different groups

Simply put Raj is a born leader. Raj consistently lead my team as well as other teams to success countless times throughout his career at GoDaddy. Raj is passionate about SMB's and SEO which drove him to go above and beyond for GoDaddy's customers.Raj lead multiple projects which had visibility to the most senior levels inside GoDaddy. Each task was completed on time and without fail. This lead to an impressive amount of successes through the years for Raj and the company.There aren't many people that I would consider a friend and a mentor but Raj stands out as a unique individual who I am proud to have in my career and in my life. You'd be hard pressed to find someone with the same level of passion and drive for success that Raj has.

Strategic Partnerships & Business Development @uberall
December 8, 2014, Raj was a client of Martin’s

I can sum Martin as a unique blend of intellect and apathy. Martin seeks to gain relationships over transactional partnerships. His drive and accountability lend well to his skills in building new channels and revenue.  What sets Martin apart is his knack for sustaining and growing relationships, I have met few folks in BD that can build and sustain relationships at a high level, Martin is surely one of those folks.  I consider him a partner and a friend.

September 12, 2014, Raj worked with Karl in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Karl for many years at Godaddy.  Karl is flat out the best Intellectual Property attorney I have worked with. Karl's relationship building skills and acumen for engineering resulted in myself filing over 20+ patents during my tenure at Godaddy. Karl held us to a higher standard and pushed me to think innovation first. Precisely why Karl was instrumental in extracting innovative ideas out of his partners in IT, Engineering and Product. Karl made the legal process easy to understand and removed any and all friction during the patent filing process, I was lucky to have worked with Karl and hope we work together again!

summary: As Vice President, Raj oversees marketing and community development at Yext. Raj is also the GM of GeoMarketing.com, a leading daily source for location and mobile marketing news for CMO's and marketing professionals. Prior to joining Yext, Raj managed GoDaddy’s Online Presence and Commerce division building it into a $100m+ business. While at GoDaddy for nine years, Raj held multiple leadership roles launching new and innovative products resulting in over twenty patents filed and seven issued.A startup fan and digital media zealot, Raj is an angel investor and advisor to multiple startups. Raj is also a co-founder of Napa Summit, an enterprise focused digital marketing conference located in historic Napa Valley. Raj received his Bachelors in International Management and MBA from the W.P. Carey School of Business at Arizona State University.
